author: pbenedict
msg: STR-2982: Add package.html to provide class summaries

author: chrisd
msg: Stash DBD connections in request_config of initial request
only, or else sub-requests and internal redirections may cause
entire DBD pool to be stashed in a single HTTP request.

author: ddewolf
msg: Page Admin now displays auto-registered portlets

author: grahamd
msg: (MODPYTHON-143) Have the handler root fallback to be the document root when
handler directives are used in Location directive or in root context of
VirtualHost or actual server. This handler root is what is used as the
first place to look for a module when using apache.import_module() or when
it is necessary to expand a path prefixed by '~/'.

author: yonik
msg: fix long overflow detection, more tests
